Articles.Content: This is more of a thread I created (for science!) my own amusement. The forum rules do, as of when I last checked, prohibit discussion of politics for obvious reasons. This thread is here to discuss what we would discuss/discuss politics at all if it WAS allowed. This thread is not a protest against forum rules or any Squad volunteer/staff decisions. We have this rule to thank for keeping the Junkyard more of a scrap heap than a Junkyard.
It's still about politics, so I guess this isn't allowed either? Anyways, someone would probably talk about how stupid the Royal baby thing is.
